Affliction.name: Stun Vulnerability
Affliction.description: General feeling of weakness, unbalance and lightheadedness makes any stun more intense.

Affliction.name: Noxious Aerosol
Affliction.description: The face has been exposed to a noxious aerosol that irritates and prevents breathing.

Affliction.name: Enlightened
Affliction.description: You have been enlightened by the light of truth. You must enlighten others, so all may know it.

Affliction.name: Time Pressure
Affliction.description: An increasing pressure from inside the head. Feels like it is about to explode, perhaps literally.

Affliction.name: Cardiac Arrest
Affliction.description: There is no pulse, the heart has stopped beating.

Affliction.name: John Cena
Affliction.description: AND HIS NAME IS JOHN CENA!

AfflictionHusk.name: Husk infection
AfflictionHusk.description: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
AfflictionHusk.causeofdeathdescription: Taken over by a husk parasite
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by the husk parasite.

Affliction.name: Undead regen
Affliction.description: Vulnerability in exchange for rapid regeneration.

Affliction.name: Husk stun
Affliction.description: The parasite is trying to take roost.

Affliction.name: Airborne Protection
Affliction.description: Can't spread airborne infections or have them be spread to you.
